title: #51: Government Waste, Evil Corporations, & NGOs
description:
Do you ever wonder if your government is being smart with your tax dollars? Of course, you donâ€™t, nobody thinks that any government is doing the right thing with their tax dollars.

It is a scientifically proven fact that governments are run by criminals, but just how bold these criminals actually are might be the only real surprise to most people.

Not satisfied to let the government commit all of the crimes, these days big corporations have gotten in on the fraud and corruption as well. The use of NGOs to shield wealth and create the perception of helping others has really taken off in recent years as the wealthy seek to transform society into a two-tiered system of slaves and masters. Some might say that we are well on our way towards that transformation, but is there still time left to change course?
